name: Diccuric
description:
Gathia is a quiet, peaceful kingdom. The king of Gathia is a very wise ruler, revered by the inhabitants. The people never complain about anything. Attacks by orcs and other barbarian tribes have long since passed... But there is one man, Balthar, a former associate of the king, he left the empire many years ago...

And now, despite his lifelong exile from the kingdom, he once again sets foot on its lands. The man gathered a band of thieves, mages, and mercenaries around him. Under his leadership, they have infiltrated the kingdom unnoticed. And so they live in a secluded corner of Gathia, and Balthar prepares to take revenge. Among the people for whom cruelty and lust for power are the meaning of life, a young boy grows up. The boy who has been by Balthar's side all the years in exile, whom he cares for as his own son. What can a teenager living amidst the grudges, intrigue, and overwhelming lust for revenge of Balthar feel? It's up to you to figure it out, because this young man will be you.

Gothic modification Diccuric will tell a completely new story about the kingdom of Gathia. Gathia is a peaceful and quiet kingdom. People never complain about anything. Attacks by orcs and other barbarian tribes have long since passed... The story revolves around young Ardaric. He follows Berengar, who rescues him from the King's men who killed Ardaric's father. In a remote part of the state of Gathia, Berengar himself gathers an army, with which he plans to overthrow the current monarch... A dramatic denouement and a moderately witty narrative await you in an interesting landscape. Some changes have been made to it compared to Gothic. The trees and grasses ripple in the wind!
